titleStmt.title: Elixir salutis; or the great preservative of health called by some, the never-failing cordial of the world. : Being most pleasant and safe for all ages, sexes, and constitutions ... / Prepared by me, Tho. Witherden ...
titleStmt.author: Witherden, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine. Library.
